segments.text: My daughter plans to quit her present job and wants to find another . She says she wants to get a better job with higher pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems quite normal to me . It is pretty much what I want to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what about settling down to start a family ? Doesn't anyone want to get married any more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is different now . The world is becoming colorful . Some of my friends don't feel the same pressure to marry . We all want to wait for the right moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time is the right moment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let the universe find us instead of forcing love . We prefer natural love . The most important thing is to be happy . Love will find us later . That is what we say .
segments.speaker: S2
